sn56.35:1.3: ‘ehambho purisa, pubbanhasamayam tam sattisatena hanissanti, majjhanhikasamayam sattisatena hanissanti, sayanhasamayam sattisatena hanissanti.
sn56.35:1.4: So kho tvam, ambho purisa, divase divase tihi tihi sattisatehi hannamano vassasatayuko vassasatajivi vassasatassa accayena anabhisametani cattari ariyasaccani abhisamessasi’ti.
sn56.35:2.4: pubba koti nappannayati sattippaharanam asippaharanam usuppaharanam pharasuppaharanam.
sn56.35:2.6: Na kho panaham, bhikkhave, saha dukkhena, saha domanassena catunnam ariyasaccanam abhisamayam vadami;
sn56.35:2.7: api caham, bhikkhave, sahava sukhena, sahava somanassena catunnam ariyasaccanam abhisamayam vadami.
sn56.35:3.1: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, ‘idam dukkhan’ti yogo karaniyo …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yogo karaniyo”ti.
